snippet.title: B.O.T.S. and the Robofriends Trailer ver.1
snippet.description:
Visit our Steam page here!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/971150/BOTS_and_the_Robofriends/

B.O.T.S. and the Robofriends is a twin-stick arcade style game set in the year 2083. Play by yourself or with friends, picking from one of four prototype robots working together to stop the invading force called G.A.R.D. Along the way you will find and rescue Robofriends, robots designed to help people in their everyday lives. Robofriends provide unique ways to aid you against the mysterious G.A.R.D. army. Join BRI, RED, TOM, and STU on the longest day since their activation

Visit our website to learn more about Game Grotto Softworks, and our games!
http://www.gamegrottosoftworks.com/

Game footage in this trailer is not final. Please look forward to more game footage.
Game Grotto Softworks © 2020 All credit for music goes to artist Randfal.

Subscribe to catch streams, clips, shorts, and trailers → https://www.youtube.com/c/GameGrotto
Join the chat and catch the streams live on twitch → https://www.twitch.tv/game_grotto

Game Grotto is a husband-and-wife vtuber and indie game development team, as well as the name of Meg and Don's indie game publishing and development company. 

Don is a robot programmer and game dev who loves retro games and gaming history. Meg is a coffee slime that does art, modeling, editing, and loves survival games. Join the Game Grotto crew and their pets Onix, Clyde, and Lanna for RPGs, dungeon crawlers, indie games, art streams, indie game dev streams, collabs and more!
